column3: When fighting enemies of the Giant subtype, gain a +4 Dodge bonus to Armor Class.
When appraising goods with precious metals or gems gain a +2 bonus to Appraise.
When fighting enemies of the Orc or Goblinoid subtypes, gain a +1 bonus to Attack rolls.
Gain a +2 bonus on Saving Throws against Poisons and Spells.
Gain a +4 bonus to CMD when resisting a Bull Rush or Trip.
Gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks against unusual stonework.
You are immune to magic sleep effects and gain a +2 bonus on Saving Throws against enchantment spells.
If you are a spell-caster, gain a +2 bonus on checks to overcome Spell Resistance. Also, gain a +2 bonus to Spellcraft when identifying magic properties.
Gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks.
When fighting enemies of the Giant subtype, gain a +4 Dodge bonus to Armor Class.

If you are a spell-caster, gain a +2 bonus on Saving Throws for illusion spells you cast. Also, regardless of your class, if your Charisma is 11 or higher you gain some spell-like abilities each day. See Paizo page for full description.
When fighting enemies of the Reptilian or Goblinoid subtypes, gain a +1 bonus to Attack rolls.
Gain a +2 bonus on Saving Throws against illusion spells.
Gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks.
Gain a +2 bonus on a Craft or Profession skill of your choice.
You are immune to magic sleep effects and gain a +2 bonus on Saving Throws against enchantment spells.
Gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks.
You gain a +2 bonus on Intimidate skill checks.

Once per day, if you are brought below 0 hit points but not killed, fight on for one more round as if disabled. At the end of your next turn, if you aren't brought above 0 hit points you will immediately fall unconscious.
Gain a +2 bonus on Saving Throws against fear.
Gain a +1 bonus on all Saving Throws (stacks with Fearless).
Gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks.
Gain a +2 bonus on Acrobatics and Climb skill checks.
Gain an additional skill rank whenever you gain a level.
